definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The hock joints are somewhat rounded, not small and sharp in contour.
sentences.chinese: 飞节略呈圆形，不能太小或轮廓过于锐利。

sentences.english: The play was abridged for TV.
sentences.chinese: 剧本经过节略，以拍摄电视片。

sentences.english: They are making further efforts to decrease military spending.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在做进一步的努力来略节略军费开支。

sentences.english: By the way, the author abridged the above-mentioned story.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一下，作者节略了上述故事。

sentences.english: This is Who's Really Who skilfully capsuled.
sentences.chinese: 这是《名人实录》一书的小巧的节略版。

definition: to lay out (an argument) item by item/memorandum to a superior
to hold the pen/to do the actual writing
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
to draft/to draw up/to compose (a plan or document)
Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Qing Dynasty
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
